transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Pale Rider's Eternal Helm

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Frost Strike and Glacial Advance by 4% stacking up to 6 times. Frost Strike and Glacial Advance have a 7% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Winning Streak! causes Frost Strike and Glacial Advance to have a 8% chance to cast Frostscythe per stack at 30% effectiveness. Losing Winning Streak! sends you into a Murderous Frenzy, casting Frostscythe at 100% effectiveness and gaining 12% Mastery for 6 sec. Additionally, Frostscythe deals 40% more damage to the first target struck.
Set: Your Runic Power spending abilities deal 8% increased damage.
(4) Set: Consuming Runic Power has a chance to increase your Strength by 10% for 8 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Frost Strike and Glacial Advance by 4% stacking up to 6 times. Frost Strike and Glacial Advance have a 7% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Losing Winning Streak! sends you into a Murderous Frenzy, casting Frostscythe at 100% effectiveness and gaining 12% Mastery for 6 sec. name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 12,865 Strength for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Carefully balance the Egg's incubation. While stationary, gain 167 Strength every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while moving. While moving, gain 154 of your highest secondary stat every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while stationary. 

Additional stacks above 20 grant 60% reduced benefit.
Use: Suspend the Egg's incubation state for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle
